pull.title: qt: Fix wallet selector size adjustment
pull.body:
This PR sets `QComboBox::AdjustToContents` instead of default `QComboBox::AdjustToContentsOnFirstShow` for wallet selectors.

Before (in master):
![screenshot from 2019-01-14 20-47-22](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/51133771-83d00d80-183e-11e9-812c-3a1119fa766e.png)

After (with this PR):
![screenshot from 2019-01-14 20-48-43](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/51133788-90546600-183e-11e9-8394-eb62a998b90f.png)

events.body: utACK ca91661a, this was on my to do list.
Is the color of this GUI also going to be changed to this dark color?

> Is the color of this GUI also going to be changed to this dark color?

No. There are different Qt versions. System-wide Qt handles dark theme of my DE.
@hebasto  Ah cool, thank you, good to hear.

tACK ca91661 on macOS 10.14.2 (qt 5.12.0) Note that on macOS if the window is too small to fit the longest wallet name between "Transactions" and the edge of the screen, the wallet selector turns into ">>" and appears below the other tabs. i.e: ![selector below tabs](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/863730/51369053-d6eedc80-1b2c-11e9-865f-319d9b6ff6a0.png) However that section folds up when you mouse away üëç Other screenshots of ca91661 usage: ![long wallet name](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/863730/51369125-1fa69580-1b2d-11e9-919c-1bd1e4d479e2.png) ![selection](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/863730/51369127-2208ef80-1b2d-11e9-945b-941ea9af9e7c.png)

Not sure if related but I'm having this:

![Screenshot 2019-05-30 at 23 10 25](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3534524/58668220-268db200-8330-11e9-8f34-972c378b9eda.png)
![Screenshot 2019-05-30 at 23 10 31](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3534524/58668221-268db200-8330-11e9-8bf3-ae1aa608c61d.png)

It only shows full wallet name (path) if it's the current.
